summary: The diff does not contain any deployment-related changes. The BuildRequest asks to retry a failed deployment process (REQ-1), but the actual changes are limited to code modifications in backend/main.mo (user profile and approval system logic) and metadata updates in project_state.json. No deployment scripts, configuration files, CI/CD workflows, or deployment commands are present in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Retry the deployment process that failed in the previous attempt
missing_requirements.reason: No deployment-related changes are present in the diff. The acceptance criteria require re-initiating deployment, logging deployment errors, and ensuring application accessibility after deployment. The diff only shows application code changes (user profiles/approval logic) and metadata updates, with no deployment scripts, infrastructure configuration, CI/CD pipeline updates, or deployment commands.

hallucinated_features.description: User profile management system with getCallerUserProfile, saveCallerUserProfile, and getUserProfile methods
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks to retry a deployment. The diff introduces user profile management functionality (save, retrieve profiles) that was not requested. This appears to be application feature development rather than deployment retry activities.

hallucinated_features.description: Enhanced authorization checks in saveCallerUserProfile requiring #user permission
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest makes no mention of authorization changes or permission requirements. The diff adds new authorization logic checking for #user permissions when saving profiles, which was not part of the deployment retry request.
